fantasy_realism.name: Fantasy Realism
fantasy_realism.prompt: A fantasy realism digital painting inspired by the reference style. Highly detailed textures, realistic anatomy blended with fantastical elements, epic lighting, and magical atmospheres. Emphasize lifelike yet otherworldly qualities.

photo_realism.name: Photo Realism
photo_realism.prompt: A photorealistic digital artwork inspired by the reference style. Ultra-detailed textures, lifelike lighting, natural skin tones, and realistic depth of field. Emphasize clarity and accuracy, like a high-resolution photo.

anime.name: Anime
anime.prompt: A cinematic anime illustration inspired by the reference style. Soft detailed shading, luminous skin, large expressive eyes, delicate line art, ethereal lighting, elegant clothing folds. Inspired by high-quality anime character art.

childrens_book.name: Childrens Book
childrens_book.prompt: A warm, whimsical children's book illustration inspired by the reference style. Soft pastel colors, playful and friendly characters, hand-drawn storybook feel, simple shapes with charming details. Wholesome and magical atmosphere.

comic_book.name: Comic Book
comic_book.prompt: A bold comic book illustration inspired by the reference style. Strong inking, dramatic poses, vibrant colors, dynamic shadows, halftone textures. Emphasize energy, action, and a graphic novel feel.

disney.name: Disney
disney.prompt: A Disney-style animated illustration inspired by the reference style. Bright colors, exaggerated expressions, clean character outlines, magical lighting. Whimsical and cinematic atmosphere, reminiscent of classic Disney movies.

neon_futuristic.name: Neon Futuristic
neon_futuristic.prompt: A neon futuristic cyberpunk illustration inspired by the reference style. Glowing neon lights, futuristic cityscapes, high-tech details, reflective surfaces. Emphasize vibrant colors, holograms, and a sci-fi cyberpunk mood.

pixelated.name: Pixelated
pixelated.prompt: A retro pixel art illustration inspired by the reference style. Blocky 8-bit or 16-bit design, nostalgic video game aesthetics, simple characters, limited color palettes. Emphasize charm and nostalgia of old-school games.

studio_ghibli.name: Studio Ghibli
studio_ghibli.prompt: A Studio Ghibli-inspired illustration. Soft painterly look, whimsical fantasy settings, expressive and charming characters, magical nature elements, warm and nostalgic atmosphere. Inspired by Hayao Miyazaki’s film style.

water_color.name: Water Color
water_color.prompt: A watercolor illustration inspired by the reference style. Soft brush textures, flowing paint strokes, pastel and blended colors, paper-like texture. Gentle and artistic mood with handmade quality.
